DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare immunological response homeopathic vaccine placebo conventional vaccine healthy young adult .
DOC.criteria: Between age 18 24 year Has receive primary childhood DTaP MMR vaccination Available follow visit ( 3 week initial visit ) Received live vaccine past 4 week Has serious allergic reaction previous vaccination Has allergies one component vaccine use ( Neomycin , egg protein ) Has history encephalopathy within 7 day receive DTP/DTap Has receive nosodes Diphtheria , Tetanus , Pertussis , Measles Mumps Has receive adult booster dose conventional vaccine diphtheria , pertussis , tetanus , mumps , measles ( Tdap MMR ) Has receive immunosuppressive dos steroid anticancer drug past 3 month Is pregnant chance could become pregnant next month Has moderate severe acute illness time enrolment Has cancer , leukemia , HIV/AIDS , serious immune health condition Has history Guillaume Barre Syndrome Has receive blood transfusion , blood product , immune globulin within past year
